title: Unity Park
description: A relaxing green space in the heart of the city with fountains, walking trails, and a playground.

title: National Mosque
description: A grand architectural landmark and one of the most iconic religious centers in Nigeria.

title: Millennium Park
description: The largest public park in Abuja with serene gardens and scenic paths.

title: Jabi Lake Mall
address: Jabi Lake, Bala Sokoto Way, Abuja
description: A major shopping destination featuring top brands, a cinema, and a lakeside view.

title: Aso Rock
description: A prominent rock formation offering views of the city and symbolic national relevance.

title: Art & Craft Village
description: A lively hub for handcrafted souvenirs, traditional artwork, and local culture.

title: Magicland Amusement Park
description: Family-friendly amusement park with rides, games, and delicious snacks.

title: Zuma Rock
description: A majestic monolith known as the 'Gateway to Abuja' with rich cultural significance.
